benchmark_details.name: LLM-KG-Bench
benchmark_details.overview: The LLM-KG-Bench framework provides a modular system for benchmarking Large Language Models in the context of knowledge graph engineering, featuring automated evaluation and support for tracking prompt engineering and model performance.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a benchmarking framework for assessing the capabilities of Large Language Models in knowledge graph engineering tasks.

data.source: LLM outputs generated during benchmark task evaluations.
data.annotation: Automatically evaluated based on task-specific metrics.

methodology.calculation: Scores are calculated based on the comparison of LLM outputs to reference outputs for specific tasks.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better performance in generating accurate knowledge graph representations.
methodology.baseline_results: Initial evaluations show varying performance across different LLMs with respect to F1 Score and errors in generated datasets.
methodology.validation: The framework allows for repeated testing with configurable parameters for robust evaluation.
